## Type of Change

- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)

- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Other (please describe)

## Testing
- [ ] Unit tests pass (`npm run test:unit`)
- [ ] Integration tests pass (`npm run test:integration`)
- [ ] Showcase demo works (`npm run showcase`)
- [ ] API server tested manually
- [ ] Web interface builds successfully (`cd frontend && npm run build`)
- [ ] Added or updated tests for new functionality

## Compliance Testing (if applicable)
- [ ] Tested with valid WCPs → APPROVED
- [ ] Tested with overtime WCPs → REVISE
- [ ] Tested with underpayment WCPs → REJECT
- [ ] Tested with invalid roles → REJECT
- [ ] Mock mode works correctly
